translation.en: ♪ You don't owe me ♪ ♪ One more minute of your wasted time ♪
♪ I'm already gone ♪
[woman] Shall we begin?
My client recognizes the deep attachment that your client has to his Mercedes
translation.es: Mi clienta reconoce el profundo apego de su cliente a su Mercedes

translation.en: and will not contest it.
[man] Mighty gracious.
-She will retain the Buick Enclave. -We don't have a problem with that.
translation.es: Se quedará con el Enclave. - No hay problema con eso. - Excelente.

translation.en: -Excellent. -[man chuckles]
translation.es: - No hay problema con eso. - Excelente.

translation.en: [woman] Now moving on to the disposition of the family home--
[man] My client requests the family home be sold
translation.es: Mi cliente desea vender la casa

translation.en: and the proceeds divided equitably between parties.
translation.es: y que la ganancia se divida equitativamente.

translation.en: While you're busy hangin' price tags, Bill Townsend,
translation.es: Mientras le pones precio a todo, Bill Townsend,

translation.en: keep in mind that you aren't worth the skin God spent to wrap your bones in.
translation.es: recuerda que tu existencia no vale nada.

translation.en: You best pray he doesn't regret his investment in you as much as I regret mine.
translation.es: Solo Dios sabe cuánto me arrepiento de haberte conocido.

translation.en: Helen?
Maddie?
-Helen, I'm sorry. -Oh, don't you dare apologize.
translation.es: - Helen, lo siento… - No te atrevas a disculparte.

translation.en: That was the most magnificent thing I've seen you do
translation.es: Fue lo más magnífico que hiciste

translation.en: since you ate that lizard in kindergarten.
translation.es: después de comer una lagartija en el kínder.

translation.en: I only bit its tail.
Maddie, this is hard.
-But you will persevere. -Yeah.
What, so Bill gets to buy mistress Noreen a new house?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿Bill le comprará una casa a Noreen?

translation.en: The kids and I just have to move and start over?
-No, you won't have to do that. -[sighs]
Helen, I swear sometimes I think it would be a blessing
translation.es: Helen, a veces creo que sería una bendición

translation.en: to live in a place that... nobody knew what happened.
translation.es: vivir en un lugar donde nadie supiera lo que pasó.

translation.en: But the kids would have to find a new school...
new friends and I'd be without you and Dana Sue and I just...
translation.es: de amigos, y yo me alejaría de ti y de Dana Sue…

translation.en: How in the devil did I get to this place?
Maddie, I got you.
But Tom came on strong because that's his job.
translation.es: Tom fue duro porque ese es su trabajo.

translation.en: I am gonna beat him down because that's my job.
translation.es: Y responderé con la misma agresividad, porque ese es el mío.

translation.en: I'm gonna get you everything you deserve and then some.
translation.es: Tendrás todo lo que te mereces y más.

translation.en: I'm still researching the legal precedent for getting Bill's head on a silver platter.
translation.es: Ya encontraré el precedente jurídico para decapitar a Bill.

translation.en: It wasn't his head that caused the problem.
translation.es: Su cabeza no causó el problema.

translation.en: That's my girl.
Thank you.
Oh, Lord.
-[boy 1] So I got cast as Puck. -[boy 2] Oh, congrats.
-[girl] Maybe I should ask for autographs. -[boy 2 laughs]
-Well, he needs help spelling his name. -[girl laughs]
-Oops, you forgot you aren't funny. -Ah!
Seriously. First a baseball star and now a theater star.
translation.es: Una estrella del béisbol y un gran actor de teatro.

translation.en: Am I even worthy to walk to school with the two of you?
translation.es: ¿Soy digna de ir a la escuela con ustedes dos?

translation.en: I'm just playing Puck. It's not even the lead.
translation.es: Solo seré Puck. No es el protagonista.

translation.en: But it's the best part, and you're only a freshman.
translation.es: Es el mejor papel y estás en primer año.

translation.en: Yeah, A Midsummer Night's Nerd!
translation.es: Sí, "Nerd de una noche de verano".

translation.en: Can't all be jerks. I mean jocks.
translation.es: No soy un idiota… digo, atleta.

translation.en: Oh, you think you're funny? Yeah? -Hey! Hey! -There ya go!
[boy 2] I can get you and your mom house seats.
[girl] I don't know if my mom can come.
translation.es: No sé si mi mamá puede ir.

translation.en: -[boys] The restaurant. -[girl] The restaurant.
[boy 2] Don't worry. You can sit with us.
[boy 1] So what does Puck even do?
He solves everything. -[boy 1] Oh. -[girl] Okay.
-Just like you, right? -[girl laughs]
-Exactly. -All right, I'll catch y'all.
translation.es: - Igual que tú, ¿no? - Exacto. Bueno, hasta luego.

translation.en: So, Annie, you had Mrs. Kelsey last year, right?
translation.es: Annie, ya tuviste a la Sra. Kelsey, ¿no?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Any tips on conquering The Odyssey?
Actually read it. She'll know if you're faking.
-Okay. -I'll see you later.
Ah! You're early! Okay, you know what?
That is fine because I am ready to go.
translation.es: Eso está bien, porque ya estoy lista para salir.

translation.en: All right, new cocktail.
I started with rye to wish you a smooth finish,
translation.es: Tiene whisky de centeno para un final suave,

translation.en: added some bitters 'cause you have every right to be.
translation.es: un toque amargo a tono con la ocasión

translation.en: Then champagne because this is truly a celebration
translation.es: y champaña, porque es algo que debemos celebrar.

translation.en: and finished with crème de pêche.
translation.es: Y un poco de licor de durazno,

translation.en: Because your future is gonna be peachy.
translation.es: porque tu futuro será muy dulce.

translation.en: Calling it Maddie's Moment.
translation.es: Se llama "Un momento en la vida de Maddie".

translation.en: There is nothing to celebrate.
Wait, what're you two up to?
Darlin', we are all about being here with you, for you.
translation.es: Cariño, sabes que puedes contar con nosotras.

translation.en: No, no, no. No. There's something else. I can smell it.
And you two should know better than anyone that I have lost my tolerance
translation.es: Deberían saber mejor que nadie que ya no tolero

translation.en: -for people keeping secrets from me. -Okay, you know what?
translation.es: - que me oculten cosas. - Bueno, ¿sabes qué?

translation.en: Let's forget celebrating, all right?
Let's think of these more as a statement of intent. Okay?
translation.es: Este momento puede ser una declaración de propósitos. ¿Te parece?

translation.en: Helen?
Press on. Okay?
Maddie, nobody's gonna make you drink, but at least sit down.
translation.es: Maddie, no tienes que beber, pero siéntate.

translation.en: -Come on. Take a moment or two-- -No, no, no. I cannot.
I cannot because if I relax, I'm gonna lose it.
translation.es: No puedo porque, si me relajo, me volveré loca.

translation.en: I swear to God, some days I just...
translation.es: Les juro que a veces, me despierto

translation.en: I wake up, and I have nothing but hate
translation.es: Les juro que a veces, me despierto y lo único que siento es un odio profundo

translation.en: for Bill and Noreen pumping through my veins.
I have to get a new job.
I have to get a new house.
I have to get a new everything, and I...
I feel like I can't even catch my breath.
-Precisely why you need new inspiration. -Dana Sue,
translation.es: - Por eso necesitas inspiración. - Dana Sue,

translation.en: -now's not the time. It's not the time. -Why isn't--
translation.es: - no es el momento, ahora no. - ¿Por qué?

translation.en: -Tell me. Tell me right this minute. -Tell her.
Maddie...
you know how Ms. Frances for a while now has been talking about downsizing?
translation.es: Ya sabes que la Sra. Frances quiere mudarse, ¿no?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Well, I thought it was a lovely idea,
translation.es: - Sí. - Bueno, pensé que sería una idea genial,

translation.en: but it also broke my heart a little
to think of that house just sitting there all empty.
translation.es: pensar en esa casa abandonada y vacía.

translation.en: So, I, uh...
I bought that big, beautiful house of hers.
-[chuckles] -[stammers] You...
Did you-- Did you ask her family?
I do not give a flying fish what Ryan Wingate thinks about anything.
translation.es: Me importa un comino lo que piense Ryan Wingate.

translation.en: -Let me tell you why-- -[clears throat] All right. All right.
translation.es: - Déjame decirte por qué. - Bueno, espera.

translation.en: Get ready for the best part.
We three are gonna turn that big, old house
into a fluffy, glorious, indulgent spa.
translation.es: en un spa fabuloso y lleno de glamour.

translation.en: Helen'll handle legal, I'll set up the cafe, and you'll be the manager.
translation.es: Helen se ocupa de lo legal, yo, de la cafetería y tú serás gerenta.

translation.en: How on God's green earth
did you two think for one second
translation.es: ¿Cómo se les pasó por la cabeza

translation.en: that I would be able to start something new,
something this huge, in the midst of all of this chaos?
translation.es: en medio de todo este caos?

translation.en: -[Helen] Maddie, it's a job. -[chuckles]
Thank you so much for understanding, friends.
This morning was a little tougher than she was prepared for.
translation.es: No estaba preparada para lo que padeció esta mañana.

translation.en: She just needs a chance to regain her bearings, that's all.
Well, I can empathize.
I thought I would lose my mind after I threw Ronnie out.
translation.es: Yo creí que me volvería loca después de echar a Ronnie.

translation.en: But I at least let you two help me.
Is that how you remember it?
Clear as day.
Well, you go on and cling to that then, Dana Sue.
translation.es: Bueno, aférrate a esa idea, Dana Sue.

translation.en: And let me try to figure out a way to talk Maddie down. [laughs]
[chuckles] Okay. All right, you think you can?
I am gonna sweep Maddie up so fast,
translation.es: Voy a endulzar a Maddie tan rápido

translation.en: you better have a bottle of your finest whiskey standing by
translation.es: qué deberás traer una botella de tu mejor whisky

translation.en: to mark the occasion, no offense to this lovely cocktail.
translation.es: para celebrar la ocasión. Sin menospreciar tu cóctel.

translation.en: Is that Macallan 18 confidence I'm hearing?
That, my dear, is Macallan 25.
Ooh, bless your heart.
All right, go forth then and work your magic.
translation.es: Muy bien, adelante. Haz tu magia.

translation.en: Son of a bitch.
Randy, we'll put you and your mom in the circus room and Dr. Bill will be right in.
translation.es: Randy, te llevaré al consultorio y el Dr. Bill irá enseguida.

translation.en: -What was that about? -Come on, Bill.
You gotta know there are a lot of people unhappy with your... situation.
translation.es: A mucha gente le desagrada tu… situación.

translation.en: Well, my personal situation is none of their business.
translation.es: Bueno, mi vida personal no es asunto de ellos.

translation.en: Well, it's half my business.
People are canceling their appointments to steer clear of you and Noreen.
translation.es: Cancelan sus citas para no verte a ti ni a Noreen.

translation.en: -And that's hurting our practice. -We're getting married.
Come on. Maddie and I were on the rocks, Howie.
translation.es: Vamos. Maddie y yo nos estábamos distanciando.

translation.en: I'm doing right by Noreen.
translation.es: Hago lo que corresponde con Noreen.

translation.en: That oughta mean something.
It means something, Bill. Just not sure what.
translation.es: No sé qué tan importante sea, Bill.

translation.en: Aren't you ready to pack it in yet, man? I mean, you're older than I am.
translation.es: ¿Aún no estás listo para retirarte? Eres mayor que yo.

translation.en: I love what I do, Collins. I'm sorry you don't.
translation.es: Me encanta lo que hago, Collins. Lamento que a ti no.

translation.en: [sighs] We will never get another offer this good!
Collins, if you want to sell your store, then sell it,
translation.es: Collins, si quieres vender tu tienda, véndela.

translation.en: but Grace and I aren't ready to sell.
translation.es: Pero Grace y yo no estamos listos.

translation.en: Pickle Jar wants the whole block.
translation.es: Pickle Jar quiere toda la cuadra.

translation.en: You don't sell, and you ruin it for all of us.
translation.es: Si no vendes, se nos complica a todos.

translation.en: Neville, Collins.
You two enjoying your meals this afternoon?
Oh, my meal was delightful as always, Dana Sue.
translation.es: Estuvo excelente, como siempre, Dana Sue.

translation.en: Well, good.
Wish I could say the same for my pig-headed companion.
translation.es: No puedo decir lo mismo de la compañía.

translation.en: Since I have upset you so, Collins,
translation.es: Como hice que te enfadaras, Collins,

translation.en: the least I can do is pay.
Damn straight. Damn straight.
You two all right?
It's hard when business comes between friends.
translation.es: Es difícil ser amigos y socios.

translation.en: [man] Mrs. Townsend.
Coach Maddox.
Do you have a moment?
Is there a problem?
I believe in Ty.
He's got an amazing arm and a great heart.
translation.es: Es muy talentoso y tiene un gran corazón.

translation.en: Oh, dear. That big a problem?
Ty and Jackson Lewis were at each other during practice.
translation.es: Se peleó con Jackson durante la práctica.

translation.en: I made 'em both run laps, and Ty will be along... momentarily.
translation.es: Hice que corrieran vueltas. Ty vendrá pronto.

translation.en: Merciful heaven, why is it always Jackson?
Those two have been grappling since the sandbox.
translation.es: Esos dos se llevan pésimo desde pequeños.

translation.en: I thought I got a whiff of a longstanding rivalry.
translation.es: Percibí que esa rivalidad venía de antes.

translation.en: Yeah, well, still, that is no excuse for Ty having a part in disrupting your practice.
translation.es: Sí, pero no es excusa para interrumpir el entrenamiento.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I-- I keep telling him that it's an honor to be coached by a professional player.
translation.es: Es un privilegio que tenga a un jugador profesional como entrenador.

translation.en: [chuckles] Former professional player.
Well, still.
Well, thank you.
Uh, but I do wanna say that Ty has been a little... hair-trigger lately...
translation.es: Quiero informarle que Ty estuvo muy sensible últimamente.

translation.en: and I don't mean to overstep, but are there any issues I should know about?
translation.es: Disculpe la intromisión, pero ¿tuvo algún problema?

translation.en: Yeah, he's... he's hit a bit of a rough patch.
translation.es: Sí, está atravesando un momento difícil.

translation.en: Ah. Junior year's a beast.
It certainly is. And he's hard on himself, and...
translation.es: Sin duda. Y él se exige mucho a sí mismo…

translation.en: I'm going to take him home now.
-As you should. -Thank you.
Anytime.
[Dana Sue] Explain this, please.
Simon Spry wrote that, not me.
translation.es: Simon Spry lo escribió, yo no.

translation.en: I am talking about the picture,
which was taken from the roof of this restaurant
in the middle of the night
by a girl who could only have gotten up there
translation.es: Solo una chica pudo haber subido

translation.en: if she took my keys without my permission.
translation.es: con las llaves que tomó sin mi permiso.

translation.en: -I don't know. -Remember how I feel about lying?
translation.es: - No sé nada. - No me gusta la mentira.

translation.en: Okay, I took a risk, but art requires risk.
translation.es: Bueno, me arriesgué. Pero un artista debe arriesgarse.

translation.en: I'm just as committed to my art as you are to yours.
translation.es: Soy muy dedicada a mis obras.

translation.en: Okay.
And by "art," you mean this Instagram account called Welcome to Serenity?
translation.es: ¿Y tus "obras" serían las fotos de esa cuenta de Instagram?

translation.en: Okay, your friend Simon says, "It presents a look at the real Serenity."
translation.es: Bueno, tu amigo Simon dice que muestra a la Serenity real,

translation.en: So I thought I would take a look at my daughter's opinion of her hometown.
translation.es: así que me puse a ver la opinión de mi hija sobre su pueblo.

translation.en: And this Instagram account
is filled with pictures of possums
translation.es: está llena de fotos de zarigüeyas,

translation.en: and broken windows and sick trees.
Is that truly how you see us?
Everyone in this town pretends to be so perfect,
translation.es: Todos en este pueblo fingen ser perfectos,

translation.en: always sweet, smiling, serene,
and then when your life blows up, you're supposed to just pretend like everything's still all good?
translation.es: Y cuando todo se va por la borda, siguen como si nada.

translation.en: All fine, all bright and shiny and--
Okay, so because of what happened with your dad,
translation.es: ¿Por lo que pasó con tu papá,

translation.en: you are gonna mock this whole town,
which is filled with good people
translation.es: que está lleno de gente buena

translation.en: just doing their best to get through the day.
This isn't about Dad.
You know, why are we even having this conversation?
You don't get me. Or my art.
I have something to say.
Well, you find another way to say it.
translation.es: Bueno, busca otra forma de expresarte.

translation.en: And don't you ever take my keys again.
translation.es: Y no vuelvas a tomar mis llaves.

translation.en: Go.
Chef, thank you for joining us.
What do you need, Brad?
Let us discuss the dissolute life this catfish led.
translation.es: Hablar de la vida libertina que tuvo este bagre.

translation.en: Overlook his sins and fry him.
Folks are coming to eat him, not befriend him.
translation.es: La gente viene a comerlo, no a salvarlo.

translation.en: I wanted to poach him.
Well, we all want things we can't have. All right, listen up, y'all.
translation.es: Es una pésima idea. De acuerdo, ¡atención!

translation.en: We have a problem.
Several bottles of very expensive liquor are missing.
translation.es: Faltan varias bebidas alcohólicas muy caras.

translation.en: [Brad] Disappointing.
These things don't happen in a well-run kitchen, people.
translation.es: Estas cosas no pasan en una cocina bien dirigida.

translation.en: How are we gonna handle this?
If the bottles are returned by end of day tomorrow,
translation.es: Si las devuelven mañana antes de finalizar la jornada,

translation.en: I absolve you. If they aren't, there will be hell to pay. That simple.
translation.es: quedan perdonados. De lo contrario, habrá consecuencias.

translation.en: Any questions?
-[employees] No, chef. -Thank you.
Back to work, everyone.
Erik's right. Let's get ready to make some hungry people happy.
translation.es: Erik tiene razón. Vamos a alimentar a los hambrientos.

translation.en: Hey, can you go upstairs and make sure Katie brushed her teeth?
translation.es: Dile a Katie que se lave los dientes.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Thank you.
Thanks for dinner, Mom.
Yeah, I'm glad you liked it. You were pretty quiet.
translation.es: Me alegra que te gustara. Estabas callado.

translation.en: Can't get a word in once Katie gets going on Trollhunters.
translation.es: Katie no paró de hablar de Trollhunters.

translation.en: I thought it was because you didn't want to tell me the details of your practice.
Told you on the way home. Practice was fine.
translation.es: Ya te dije que estuvo bien.

translation.en: -Tyler. -Mother.
Coach Maddox told me there was a problem.
translation.es: El entrenador dijo que pasó algo.

translation.en: That's great.
Thought maybe you'd wanna fess up.
translation.es: Pensé que querrías hablar de eso.

translation.en: Tell me the details.
[scoffs] Okay. Okay, Jacks is a jerk. Coach is a hardass, and I ran laps. Is that enough detail?
translation.es: Jackson es un imbécil y el entrenador me hizo correr unas vueltas, ¿listo?

translation.en: -Watch your tone. -Can I watch it in my room?
Tyler, I've had myself a day,
translation.es: - ¿Puedo retirarme? - Tyler, tuve un día de perros.

translation.en: and the last thing I need is disrespect from you to ice the cake.
translation.es: No necesito esta falta de respeto.

translation.en: -Yeah, but-- -Go upstairs before you say something that I will make you regret.
translation.es: Sube antes de que digas algo que te haga lamentar.

translation.en: God, I-- I thought you'd gone!
Inspiration struck.
I want to experiment.
Uh, not at this hour.
This is when I do my best cooking.
Well, that's supposed to be when you're on the clock.
translation.es: Debería ser así en tu horario de trabajo.

translation.en: -[Dana Sue chuckles] -Eh, you know,
you squelch my creativity because you're jealous.
translation.es: Inhibes mi creatividad porque estás celosa.

translation.en: Have you been drinking?
I'm not on your stupid clock.
translation.es: No es mi horario de trabajo.

translation.en: You're in my kitchen.
And there's no drinking in my kitchen. Ever.
translation.es: Y no se bebe en mi cocina. Nunca.

translation.en: What...
-Oh, you like my cologne? -Oh my God, that's whiskey!
That is old, expensive whiskey!
You thief!
You know, everything that you have
is because of me.
Everything I have, I worked for.
translation.es: Todo lo que tengo es fruto de mi trabajo

translation.en: And sacrificed for
without talking down to my staff
or pretending that my talent excuses bad behavior.
translation.es: y sin pretender que mi talento justifique el mal comportamiento.

translation.en: You know the reason female chefs rarely succeed?
translation.es: ¿Sabes por qué las mujeres chefs no suelen tener éxito?

translation.en: You can't take criticism.
Goodbye, Brad.
[chortles] Oh, come on!
Ah, don't be a buzzkill.
We got this beautiful piece of meat to play with.
translation.es: Tenemos un hermoso corte para experimentar

translation.en: -We got all night. -You're fired.
[chortles] No, I'm not.
Well,
I don't think I could use any smaller words.
translation.es: no creí que necesitara palabras tan cortas.

translation.en: Go.
-No, come on. -Don't touch me!
Get out.
Get out.
Get your things and get out of here!
And leave your key.
Daddy! Daddy's here!
[woman] Hi, Katie.
[Katie] No, you're not Daddy.
-Noreen. -Bill got called into the office.
translation.es: - Noreen. - Llamaron a Bill del consultorio.

translation.en: There's this nasty bug going around,
and we just got flooded with emergency walk-ins.
translation.es: y tenemos muchas consultas de emergencia.

translation.en: So I'm here to pick them up.
Okay, I'm not going.
Oh, no, your dad doesn't have to work the whole day.
translation.es: Tu papá no tiene que trabajar todo el día.

translation.en: He's just running late, and he didn't want y'all to have to wait.
translation.es: Está demorado y no quería que esperaran.

translation.en: It's your dad's day.
Yeah, well, I don't have the bug so I don't need to see him.
translation.es: No tengo el virus, así que no necesito verlo.

translation.en: I'm staying with Ty.
I'm not gonna force my children to go with you.
translation.es: No obligaré a mis hijos a ir contigo.

translation.en: Bill will be so disappointed.
Yeah, well, Bill should be here.
I'll go.
So, how's school?
Great.
I'm in the spring play. I'm Puck in Midsummer Night's Dream.
translation.es: Actuaré en una obra, Sueño de una noche de verano.

translation.en: I don't know that one.
Shakespeare?
I've only seen one play. It was beautiful.
translation.es: Solo he visto una obra. Maravillosa.

translation.en: It was called Cats.
Yeah, but that's a musical.
translation.es: Sí, pero esa es un musical.

translation.en: It's not real theater.
But your play is?
Doesn't get much more classic.
Tell me more.
[Helen] Hey, girl.
Hey, morning.
You know, Erik's at the Farmer's Market hunting strawberries for shortcake
translation.es: Erik está en el mercado buscando fresas

translation.en: and you are way too early for croissants.
I'm on my way to the office for a little quiet work time, and I thought I'd pop in and say good morning.
translation.es: Iba a la oficina para trabajar en paz y quise venir a darte los buenos días.

translation.en: Well, good morning.
You alone?
Yeah, had to get a jump on things.
Short-handed.
I fired Brad.
I see.
He was drinking.
-You have a rule. -And he stole from me.
translation.es: - Tienes una regla. - Y me robó.

translation.en: Oh, he broke the law.
And he lied to me.
And I will not have a man who lies in this kitchen or in my life.
translation.es: No quiero hombres que me mientan, ni en la cocina ni en mi vida.

translation.en: You'll find better.
-[sighs] -For both.
[chuckles] Thank you. Thank you.
I hope so.
Hello! -Mama. -[chuckles]
[chuckling] How crappy is your day, dear?
Well, that's such a kind assumption.
If your day was fabulous,
your daughter would not have called me, begging me to rescue her.
translation.es: tu hija no me habría llamado para que la rescatara.

translation.en: Katydid! Nana's here!
You know she's not supposed to use the phone without permission.
translation.es: No puede usar el teléfono sin permiso.

translation.en: Well, just be grateful that she called me instead of someone less fun.
translation.es: Agradece que me haya llamado a mí que soy tan divertida.

translation.en: Oh, you're-- Good girl! You're doing your resume!
But not very well. But you're doing it!
translation.es: No muy bien, pero algo es algo.

translation.en: Okay, well, don't help, Mama.
Mothers returning to the workforce should be thinking in terms of relevant experience.
translation.es: Una madre que vuelve a trabajar debe pensar en la experiencia relevante.

translation.en: For instance, um,
organizing school field trips is material and manpower management.
translation.es: organizar viajes escolares requiere habilidades de administración.

translation.en: When was the last time you did a resume?
Never, I have a catalog. My paintings speak for me.
translation.es: No, tengo un catálogo con mis pinturas.

translation.en: Well, then you should probably be the last person giving me advice on writing one.
translation.es: Entonces no deberías darme consejos sobre cómo hacerlo.

translation.en: Why does everyone think they can sit in judgment in my life?
translation.es: ¿Por qué todos creen que pueden juzgarme?

translation.en: People are trying to help you because they love you,
translation.es: Los que te queremos intentamos ayudarte

translation.en: and they believe that you deserve better.
translation.es: y creemos que mereces lo mejor.

translation.en: Me and my friends are ready to go, Nana!
Well, then let's go and have ourselves... [kisses] ...an adventure!
translation.es: De acuerdo, entonces nos iremos a vivir una aventura.

translation.en: Oh, you know what you have to do before we go.
translation.es: Debes hacer algo antes de irnos.

translation.en: -Bye, Mommy. -Bye, baby.
Have fun.
How bad can the world be, really?
[Paula] So, are we gonna go get those black shoes today?
-[Katie] Yeah. -[Paula] You're very grown-up!
So you have heard of the Pickle Jar?
I haven't been inside one.
But the commercials make it look like an arcade
translation.es: En los comerciales, parecen tiendas de videojuegos

translation.en: crossed with a barn wrapped up in a burger joint.
translation.es: En los comerciales, parecen tiendas de videojuegos donde venden hamburguesas.

translation.en: -Yeah. -They're loud and messy,
and they don't have ice cream!
-[laughs] -[Neville] They wanna buy the whole block.
Us, the hardware store, and the dry cleaner.
translation.es: Nuestra tienda, la ferretería y la tintorería.

translation.en: The Gibsons don't wanna sell.
Collins, he'd sell the hardware store and leave town tomorrow.
translation.es: Collins vendería la ferretería sin titubear.

translation.en: What do you want to do?
Serenity does need the new business.
Just not this one.
It would be great to travel.
You'd be bored in a week.
Do I sense a lack of consensus?
Mr. Worry Wart here is suddenly thinking
that maybe we should sell for the greater good.
translation.es: cree que lo mejor sería vender.

translation.en: Go along with Collins, persuade the Gibsons,
translation.es: Hacerle caso a Collins, persuadir a los Gibson

translation.en: and use the money to help Serenity in some new way.
translation.es: y usar el dinero para hacer que Serenity crezca.

translation.en: Which is why we wanted to see what you think of the offer.
translation.es: Por eso queríamos saber qué opinas de la oferta.

translation.en: We do need to think of the greater good here.
translation.es: Debemos pensar en el mayor beneficio.

translation.en: You and I have always been committed to bringing business to Serenity, Helen.
translation.es: Siempre quisimos promover el crecimiento comercial en Serenity.

translation.en: Why else be on Town Council?
translation.es: Por eso estamos en el ayuntamiento.

translation.en: But as happy as Grace and I are here...
translation.es: Pero por más que estemos felices aquí,

translation.en: ...if you think this is a good offer and we--
translation.es: si crees que es una buena oferta…

translation.en: They're lowballing you. Significantly. They won't come up in any meaningful way.
translation.es: Es una pésima oferta. Dudo mucho que la aumenten.

translation.en: Thank you, Jesus!
All right, sugar. We are not selling.
Helen says it's okay.
But what happens to Collins?
Well, we can work on finding him another option,
translation.es: Bueno, podemos buscar otra opción para él,

translation.en: if he'll let us.
Helen Decatur, I'm making you a milkshake to celebrate.
translation.es: Helen Decatur, celebraremos con una malteada.

translation.en: Yes.
[Annie] I've got dessert!
-Yay! Chef Erik brownies! -[Annie chuckles]
Mom knows they're your favorite.
translation.es: Mamá sabe que son tus favoritos.

translation.en: So, Margarita Night underway?
Yeah, uh, Aunt Helen came in with Mom and me.
translation.es: Sí, la tía Helen vino también.

translation.en: -They're in the living room. -As always.
translation.es: - Están en la sala. - Como siempre.

translation.en: Uh, no, thanks. I gotta bounce. I'm meeting Luke.
translation.es: No, gracias. Me voy a ver a Luke.

translation.en: Should I put it in the fridge?
I'll take that!
-Would you like to go-- -Trollhunters!
Captain, you have the comm.
Wow, great power and great responsibility.
translation.es: Capitán, le cedo el mando. Es mucha responsabilidad.

translation.en: I believe in you.
All right, y'all. Don't have too much fun.
[all] Pour it out.
This touches my soul.
The companions or the margaritas?
Mmm. Yes.
I thank heavens for Margarita Nights.
I truly, truly believe
that there is not a problem in this world
translation.es: que no hay problema en este mundo

translation.en: that cannot be solved by having a drink and a talk
translation.es: que no se pueda resolver conversando y tomando una copa

translation.en: with the two of you.
It's been a week, hasn't it?
Oof. Yeah, my week had a week.
Right. I fired Brad.
So I have to find a new sous-chef and...
translation.es: Debo buscar un nuevo subchef y…

translation.en: ugh, just regular kitchen turmoil.
translation.es: ...la cocina es un caos, lo habitual.

translation.en: Oh, and also my daughter hates me and hates Serenity
translation.es: Y además mi hija me odia, a mí y a Serenity,

translation.en: and can't wait to get away from both of us, so--
translation.es: y no ve la hora de largarse de aquí.

translation.en: What happened with Annie?
She is going through that very special phase.
translation.es: Está atravesando esa etapa muy especial.

translation.en: Serenity is small and slow and she must see the world.
translation.es: Serenity es pequeña y lenta, y ella quiere ver el mundo.

translation.en: Oh, I remember that phase.
Yeah. You do, and you did it. You left. Cheers.
translation.es: Sí, y lo hiciste. Te fuiste. ¡Salud!

translation.en: Yes, cheers. [chuckles]
All right, well, this is what Annie thinks of Serenity.
translation.es: Bueno, esto es lo que Annie piensa de Serenity.

translation.en: [Helen] Whatever happened to expressing yourself through bad haircuts and loud music?
translation.es: ¿No debería cortarse el cabello y escuchar música fuerte?

translation.en: -[Dana Sue] Thank you. -[Maddie] These are good.
No.
-Not the possum. -[Helen] That's a possum!
-But the pictures. -[Helen] Uh-uh. She should keep this up.
translation.es: Me refiero a las fotos. Debería seguir con esto.

translation.en: Well, this isn't really how I want her to see Serenity.
translation.es: No quiero que vea a Serenity de esta forma.

translation.en: You can encourage her art while also continuing to change her point of view.
translation.es: Puedes alentarla y, al mismo tiempo, cambiar su punto de vista.

translation.en: [Dana Sue] But the art, right?
[Maddie] I'm sorry, Dana Sue.
And I'm sorry about Brad.
Is that why you're carrying that weight of the world look on your face?
translation.es: ¿Es por eso que andas con esa cara?

translation.en: You mean this?
It's all the rage this season, you know? [laughs]
And it goes perfectly with my "Are you sure you want my opinion?" lipstick.
translation.es: Combina muy bien con mi labial "No quieres saber mi opinión".

translation.en: Mmm. I highly recommend the "Don't make me smack you" nail polish.
translation.es: Te recomiendo el esmalte de uñas "No me provoques".

translation.en: [Maddie] Favorite shade.
You know, all this beauty talk sure makes me wish
we were going somewhere soothing and relaxing,
translation.es: siento ganas de ir a un lugar tranquilo y relajante,

translation.en: like a spa.
Mmm. Oh my, yes. I would do anything to go to one.
translation.es: Cielos, sí. Daría lo que fuera para ir a uno de esos.

translation.en: -Me too. -Or better yet, to run one!
translation.es: - Yo también. - O mejor aún, ¡dirigir uno!

translation.en: Stop.
I know you guys mean well, but my life is insane.
translation.es: Tienen buenas intenciones, pero mi vida es un caos.

translation.en: I'm holding it together by duct tape and happy thoughts and I'm near out of both.
translation.es: Aguanto porque intento pensar en positivo, pero es cada vez más difícil.

translation.en: Which makes this the perfect time to start something new.
translation.es: Por eso debes emprender algo nuevo.

translation.en: I mean, I don't know if it's going to restock your duct tape,
translation.es: No sé si te ayudará a sobrellevar esto,

translation.en: but...
-those happy thoughts will just-- -[Maddie] What about you?
You're swamped at the restaurant. You think you can take this on too?
translation.es: Estás hasta el cuello con el restaurante. ¿Podrás con esto?

translation.en: You know me. The busier I am, the happier I am.
translation.es: Me conoces. Me encanta estar ocupada.

translation.en: Maddie, you are a terrific manager.
And you have a gift for marketing.
translation.es: Y tienes un don para el marketing.

translation.en: You remember what that boutique in Charleston looked like
-before you started? -Barely.
That was before the kids.
That was how you put Bill through medical school.
translation.es: Bill pudo estudiar medicina gracias a tu trabajo.

translation.en: Another lifetime.
And another lifetime starts right now.
With you in the driver's seat, -pedal to the metal... -[Helen] Yes.
translation.es: Tú vas al volante, a máxima velocidad,

translation.en: ...not answering to a man.
♪ It's yo' money, yo' destiny ♪
translation.es: Es tu dinero, es tu destino

translation.en: Wait, so this is charity?
What?
Maddie, it's an investment.
Maddie, Maddie, we have been talking about this since we were Katie's age!
translation.es: Maddie, hablamos de esto desde que teníamos la edad de Katie.

translation.en: Going into business together, remember?
The Sweet Magnolias making their mark on Serenity.
translation.es: Las Dulces magnolias dejando su marca en Serenity.

translation.en: Our, our spa is the perfect way to do that.
translation.es: Nuestro spa es la manera perfecta de hacer eso.

translation.en: -Come on, Maddie. You gotta trust us. -[Maddie] Okay.
When have we ever led you astray?
Don't answer that.
[laughing] I'm not. I can't. I cannot answer that.
translation.es: No, no puedo responder a eso.

translation.en: That's not the way to convince her! Don't lie to her!
translation.es: ¡Esa no es forma de convencerla! ¡No le mientas!

translation.en: I take it back.
Then what is it that binds us together as a congregation?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿qué es lo que nos une como congregación?

translation.en: As a community?
Is it habit? Obligation?
Or is it a shared vision of the future
translation.es: ¿O es la visión a futuro que compartimos

translation.en: informed by the simple, eloquent commandment to love one another?
translation.es: basada en el simple mandamiento de amarnos unos a otros?

translation.en: If we can trust that sharing, that commitment,
translation.es: Si confiamos en esa visión compartida, en ese compromiso,

translation.en: then we can go forward and do great things for each other
translation.es: podremos avanzar y hacer grandes cosas por el prójimo

translation.en: and for the Lord.
The kingdom doesn't have to advance with brass bands or bulldozers.
translation.es: El reino no tiene que progresar con bandas militares o topadoras.

translation.en: No, it can advance gently,
with love, with respect, and with grace.
-Amen? -[congregation] Amen.
And now it is my pleasure to invite Joyful Noise to come forward.
translation.es: Y ahora es un placer para mí presentarles al coro Cántico de Gozo.

translation.en: ♪ I'm walking with Jesus ♪
♪ The way that he teaches... ♪
Glad you could come hear Katie sing, Bill.
translation.es: Gracias por venir a escuchar a Katie.

translation.en: -She did a great job. -Oh, didn't she, though?
Welcome to Prince of Peace. I'm Pastor June Wilkes.
translation.es: Bienvenida a Príncipe de la Paz. Soy June Wilkes.

translation.en: -Noreen Fitzgibbons. -Oh.
Bill's fiancée.
Your church is beautiful.
Thank you very much. Well, good to see you, Bill.
translation.es: - Muchas gracias. Me alegra verte, Bill. - Gracias.

translation.en: -Thank you. -See you next time?
You bet. Of course. Thank you, Pastor.
People are staring more than usual this week.
translation.es: La gente mira demasiado esta semana.

translation.en: Is my dress hiked up in the back?
It isn't your dress. It's your ex.
translation.es: No eres tú. Es tu ex.

translation.en: Everyone's just waiting for you to melt down 'cause Bill and the nurse are here.
translation.es: Todos esperan tu colapso emocional porque Bill vino con la enfermera.

translation.en: Well, precisely why I won't.
Well, heck, if you're not gonna make a scene, then why am I standing here? I have gotta go to work.
translation.es: Si no harás una escena, ¿qué hago aquí? Debo ir a trabajar.

translation.en: -Okay. -[laughing]
-All right, where did Annie get to? -Mmm.
She's had a visit.
I'll bring her back. We'll catch a movie or something.
translation.es: La traeré de vuelta. Veré una película o algo.

translation.en: Thank you. You are a very thoughtful godmother.
Yeah. You should see what I can do with a pumpkin and a couple of mice.
translation.es: Dame una calabaza y unos ratones, y verás.

translation.en: I'd like to see that.
It really is pretty.
I wish we could get married here.
We'll get married somewhere beautiful, all right?
translation.es: Nos casaremos en un lugar hermoso, ¿sí?

translation.en: Just not here. It wouldn't be--
Appropriate. I know.
Hey, why don't you get yourself something to eat, okay?
I'm gonna go have a chat with Tyler right quick.
Lemonade?
I assume you're not drinking coffee these days.
translation.es: Supongo que no estás tomando café.

translation.en: Thank you so much, Peggy.
It must be hard, what you're going through.
translation.es: Debe ser un momento difícil para ti.

translation.en: Especially without your family.
You're in my prayers.
Well, you need a pitching coach.
-I mean, your fastball should be-- -I'm fine.
Look, Coach Maddox may have played for the Braves,
translation.es: Mira, el entrenador Maddox jugó para los Braves,

translation.en: but he was a shortstop, not a pitcher.
translation.es: pero él era campocorto, no lanzador.

translation.en: And this is his first year coaching high school.
translation.es: Es su primer año como entrenador.

translation.en: -You're a guinea pig. -I'm fine.
translation.es: Es su primer año como entrenador. Estoy bien.

translation.en: -Look, a fraternity brother of mine-- -Dad, I'm fine!
translation.es: - Un compañero de la universidad… - ¡Estoy bien!

translation.en: Okay, just back off!
Hey, you watch your tone, son.
I'm your father, and this is church.
translation.es: Soy tu papá y estamos en la iglesia.

translation.en: It's the day of rest. Can we give it one, please?
translation.es: ¿No puede pasar el domingo en paz?

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm trying to have a conversation with my son, okay?
translation.es: Bueno, intento hablar con mi hijo, ¿sabes?

translation.en: What do you want from me?
Right here? Right now?
I want whatever... Everything that went wrong between us
translation.es: Quiero que todo lo que salió mal entre nosotros

translation.en: just to stay between us.
I miss the kids, Maddie.
I'm sure you do.
You just need to give them some time.
And it wouldn't hurt to show them a little understanding.
translation.es: Y no estaría de más ser comprensivo.

translation.en: Well, it wouldn't hurt if they showed me a little respect.
translation.es: No estaría de más que fueran respetuosos.

translation.en: My daddy taught me that respect is earned.
translation.es: Me enseñaron que el respeto se gana.

translation.en: Maybe your daddy told you the same while he was busy teaching you that you're always right.
translation.es: Quizá te enseñaron lo mismo mientras te daban siempre la razón.

translation.en: Is that how you're talking about me with them?
I try my best to not talk about you.
translation.es: Hago lo posible para no hablar de ti.

translation.en: -Hey, Noreen! -Hey!
Can you eat cookies?
With the baby and all?
I watch what I eat, but I love a good chocolate chip cookie.
translation.es: Me cuido, pero acepto una galleta con chips de chocolate.

translation.en: -Here. -Oh, thanks.
I, um... I looked up that play you're in.
translation.es: Busqué la obra en la que actuarás.

translation.en: -Yeah? -You didn't tell me it was so sad.
translation.es: - ¿Sí? - No me dijiste que era triste.

translation.en: It's not. It's a comedy.
translation.es: No lo es. Es una comedia.

translation.en: But... everybody's with the wrong person.
translation.es: Todos están con la persona equivocada.

translation.en: Yeah, but they get it right in the end.
And I help.
I mean, I guess I kinda start the whole mess in the first place,
translation.es: Creo que primero causo el conflicto,

translation.en: but then I go and, uh...
You should see it.
I'd like that.
Oh, not now, Helen! All right?
Brace yourself.
I want to help you.
So Brad's not coming back?
Nope, Isaac, he is not.
When's my interview?
I appreciate that. Truly I do, but you're fresh outta culinary school.
translation.es: Gracias, de verdad, pero te graduaste hace poco.

translation.en: You don't have the experience on the line to be second in command, plus God gifted you to make desserts.
translation.es: No tienes experiencia para el puesto y Dios te dio el don de la pastelería.

translation.en: I can do both.
[Dana Sue chuckles] No.
No, you would wear yourself to a nub, and I couldn't bear the guilt.
translation.es: Sería demasiado trabajo para ti y me daría culpa.

translation.en: Appreciate you, but I will figure this out.
translation.es: Te lo agradezco, pero lo resolveré.

translation.en: -Are you gonna dance with me forever? -Yep.
Do you wanna twirl me?
-[Katie] I'll get it! -Okay.
Daddy!
Hey there, kiddo.
-[Katie] Daddy's here! -I see that, sweetheart.
Daddy, Mommy's making chicken parm. You should stay.
translation.es: Papi, deberías quedarte a probar el pollo parmesano.

translation.en: Well, that is sweet of you, ladybug!
translation.es: Qué dulce de tu parte, Catarina.

translation.en: But tonight, I can't.
Another day, though.
I promise.
Right now I just need to talk to your mom right quick,
translation.es: Ahora necesito hablar con tu mamá,

translation.en: so why don't you run on upstairs and play, okay?
translation.es: ¿por qué no vas arriba a jugar un rato?

translation.en: All right.
I know, I should've called first.
translation.es: Lo sé, debí haber llamado primero.

translation.en: -Is this about what happened after church? -Yeah.
translation.es: - ¿Es por lo de la iglesia? - Sí.

translation.en: It is, but not about our conversation.
translation.es: Sí, pero no sobre lo que hablamos.

translation.en: After you left...
I talked to Helen.
Look, I want to do the right thing here, Maddie.
translation.es: Mira, quiero hacer lo correcto, Maddie.

translation.en: So...
you and the kids should keep the house.
And we'll make it work, okay?
I'm sure that parm's gonna be terrific.
Yeah.
Aunt Helen, why'd you come back?
San Francisco.
Why'd you come back here to Serenity?
Why?
I've just been thinking, you know, you got out.
translation.es: Estuve pensando en que te fuiste, ¿sabes?

translation.en: You traveled, had adventures, you ran away with a boy--
translation.es: Tuviste aventuras, huiste con un chico…

translation.en: I did not run away with Ryan Wingate. Who told you that?
translation.es: No huí con Ryan Wingate. ¿Quién te dijo eso?

translation.en: We got back together in college,
and then we made a careful plan to go to San Francisco after I finished law school.
translation.es: y el plan infalible era ir a San Francisco cuando terminara la carrera.

translation.en: There was no running away.
So what happened?
[sighs] The careful plan unraveled.
We broke up.
But you're brilliant and amazing. You could've gone anywhere.
translation.es: Pero podrías haber ido a cualquier lado.

translation.en: Why'd you come back here?
Well, my mother was sick,
and my father was already gone,
translation.es: y mi padre ya no estaba.

translation.en: so I needed to be here with her.
translation.es: Tuve que quedarme aquí con ella.

translation.en: And you stayed?
Hmm. Yeah.
Because in the darkest moments of my life, this town stood with me.
translation.es: En los peores momentos de mi vida, este pueblo estuvo conmigo.

translation.en: Through losing my father,
fighting with the mill, and my mother's illness.
translation.es: lo de la fábrica, la enfermedad de mamá.

translation.en: People like Ms. Grace and Mr. Neville and Ms. Frances,
translation.es: Gente como la Srta. Grace, el Sr. Neville y la Sra. Frances

translation.en: they-- they held me up.
But most of all, your mother and Maddie.
translation.es: Y sobre todo, tu madre y Maddie.

translation.en: They loved me.
They saved me.
How could I leave them?
Come on.
We have laughed, we have cried,
we have eaten popcorn.
Meanwhile, y'all look like you've played eight quarters of football around here.
translation.es: Y aquí parece que corrieron un maratón.

translation.en: How's life sans Brad?
Hectic.
I should get ready for my shift.
-Thank you, Aunt Helen. -Anytime.
No offense, but you're not going to survive without a second in command.
translation.es: No te ofendas, pero no sobrevivirás sin subchef.

translation.en: I will find someone. Don't start worrying about me.
translation.es: Encontraré a alguien. No te preocupes.

translation.en: I will stop pushing, but I will not stop worrying.
translation.es: Dejaré de molestar, pero no dejaré de preocuparme por ti.

translation.en: It is how I express my love.
translation.es: Así es como expreso mi amor.

translation.en: Besides, how am I supposed to look June Wilkes in the eye on Sunday
translation.es: ¿Y cómo miraré a June Wilkes a los ojos el domingo

translation.en: if I do not stand with a sister in need today?
translation.es: si no ayudo a una hermana que me necesita?

translation.en: -Amen. -Amen.
Erik, what is that?
It's Brad's infamous pot pie.
No, it's not. The crust--
But the crust was made by a pastry chef so, of course, it's better.
translation.es: Es una masa hecha por un pastelero. Es mejor.

translation.en: Plus, I added a touch of sugar for sweetness
translation.es: Además, le agregué un toque de azúcar

translation.en: to contrast with the savoriness of the filling.
translation.es: para contrastar con el sabor del relleno.

translation.en: I changed up some of the spices in the gravy too.
translation.es: También cambié las especias de la salsa.

translation.en: That's the cardamom talking.
Mmm. What other talents are you hiding, Mr. Whitley?
What else would you like to see?
Wanna put this on the dinner menu Tuesday night?
It would be an honor, chef.
All right. I still want those brownies out.
translation.es: Muy bien. También quiero los brownies.

translation.en: -They're coming. They're coming. -All right. Get busy.
translation.es: - Ya vienen. - Muy bien, a trabajar.

translation.en: Get back inside!
[Neville] You want Pickle Jar to come in here and take over a business
-that's been here for over 80 years. -[Mary] Wait, hold on!
translation.es: - un negocio de más de 80 años. - Espera.

translation.en: [Neville] Ah, Helen!
Mary Vaughn has invited us to a meeting.
translation.es: Mary Vaughn nos invitó a una reunión.

translation.en: Would you like to come along?
I'm sorry.
This meeting is just for the Whartons, the Gibsons, and Collins Littlefield.
translation.es: Es una reunión para los Wharton, los Gibson y Collins Littlefield.

translation.en: Ah. The Pickle Jar sales stakeholders!
translation.es: Los interesados en la venta de Pickle Jar.

translation.en: And are you holding this meeting
in your role as our mayor's wife or in your role as the realtor
translation.es: como la esposa del alcalde o como la agente inmobiliaria

translation.en: with the greatest financial interest in these sales going through?
translation.es: que se verá más beneficiada con las ventas?

translation.en: As an interested citizen.
[Helen] Oh! Well, then, this should be a public meeting.
translation.es: Pues debería ser un acto público.

translation.en: And, Peggy, I hope that for the benefit of an informed populace,
translation.es: Peggy, espero que mantengas a la población informada

translation.en: you will cover this public meeting
translation.es: y des todos los detalles de este acto público,

translation.en: in your role as a deputy editor of our paper
and not in the role of Mary Vaughn's best friend.
translation.es: y no como la mejor amiga de Mary Vaughn.

translation.en: I've put this town first my entire life, Helen.
translation.es: Siempre prioricé el bienestar de este pueblo.

translation.en: Can you say the same?
Always a pleasure, Mr. Neville, Ms. Grace.
translation.es: Ha sido un placer, señor Neville y señora Grace.

translation.en: Bless your heart.
Breathe, Ty.
Good effort, Ty! Go get your gear. We're done for today.
translation.es: ¡Bien hecho, Ty! Busca tus cosas. Terminamos.

translation.en: Hey, don't go soft, Harlan.
You can't let him get away with throwing junk. The kid's got a gift.
translation.es: No dejes que lance así. Tiene un don.

translation.en: And the kid's world is blowing up. We can cut him some slack and still get him into the Hall of Fame.
translation.es: Está pasando un mal momento. Tendrá éxito aunque nos relajemos.

translation.en: -Hold on. What're you talking about? -Cal,
I know you're the new kid in town, but really? Ty's dad?
translation.es: sé que eres el nuevo, ¿pero no sabes de su papá?

translation.en: Is a doctor and a big donor, so?
translation.es: ¿Es un médico que dona mucho dinero?

translation.en: So, Dr. Bill had an affair with his nurse.
translation.es: El Dr. Bill tuvo una aventura

translation.en: A girl closer to Ty's age than his own.
translation.es: con una chica apenas mayor que Ty.

translation.en: Knocked her up and left his family to...
do the right thing by the nurse.
translation.es: y se fue con su nueva familia.

translation.en: Boy has every right to be off his game.
How the heck did I miss that?
You need to do some more catching drills, Coach.
Yeah.
[Maddie] Hey.
How was practice?
Ty?
I suck, Mom.
I should just quit.
You're not gonna quit.
I know what people think every time I step on that mound, okay?
translation.es: Sé lo que piensan de mí en el campo.

translation.en: Yeah, so do I.
That you're a fine young man, and you are a superb pitcher.
translation.es: Que eres un buen joven y un excelente lanzador.

translation.en: Yeah, I wish.
Ty...
you don't carry anyone's sins but your own.
translation.es: No cargues con los males de los demás.

translation.en: Focus on the fact that you have a gift.
And you're gonna be thankful for that gift.
And you are gonna develop it and you are gonna listen to the coaches that help you do just that.
translation.es: Desarróllalo y escucha a los entrenadores que te ayudan a hacerlo.

translation.en: Look, I know it's hard.
It's hard, and it's unfair, and it's lousy,
and Lord knows I would change everything for you if I could.
translation.es: y Dios sabe que cambiaría todo por ti si pudiera.

translation.en: But we're gonna find our way forward.
Together.
Because I'm always here for you.
And I believe in you.
I love you.
Yes. Thank you.
-Good game! -Oh, yeah. As usual.
-What's that bring my debt to? -[laughs]
Five figures?
Or a recommendation of a good fertility specialist.
-For you? You still have-- -No, please.
Don't say that I have time.
As a certain birthday looms, it sounds a little pitying.
translation.es: Mi cumpleaños se aproxima, es como si sintieras lástima.

translation.en: Okay, but asking as your old... make that longtime friend, not your doctor,
translation.es: Bueno, te pregunto como tu viejo amigo, no como tu médico…

translation.en: something happen?
You're sweet. No, no.
This isn't caused by an affair or the lack of one.
translation.es: Esto no es por una relación o por la falta de una.

translation.en: I'm just... examining my options.
I could recommend a friend from medical school.
She's in Charleston.
But she's a straight-talking woman. Strong opinions.
translation.es: Pero es una mujer directa, de firmes convicciones.

translation.en: I don't know that you two would get along.
translation.es: No sé si se llevarían bien.

translation.en: Mama?
Oh, my goodness! A surprise visit!
Ooh! And an unsolicited kiss. What happened?
translation.es: Y un beso no solicitado. ¿Qué pasó?

translation.en: I made a mistake.
Well, you didn't make me a grandma before 40
translation.es: Bueno, no me hiciste abuela antes de los 40,

translation.en: and in this town, that's saying something.
translation.es: eso es todo un logro en este pueblo.

translation.en: So how bad could your mistake be?
Well, I had a moment today where I realized
that a child does not always understand when their parent is trying to take care of them.
translation.es: de que un hijo no siempre entiende que sus padres intentan cuidarlo.

translation.en: So I wanted to apologize to you
for snapping at you Saturday about...
translation.es: por cómo te traté el sábado sobre…

translation.en: well, everything.
You could've called.
Oh please, darlin'. I was raised better than that.
translation.es: Por favor, cariño. No me criaron así.

translation.en: Oh, sweet girl.
I am so sorry
that life is kicking you in the fanny so hard right now.
translation.es: que la vida te esté dando una paliza en este momento.

translation.en: [sighs] What you need is a lavender bath and a glass of Merlot.
translation.es: Lo que necesitas es un baño de inmersión y una copa de Merlot.

translation.en: Oh, as lovely as that sounds, I can't. I gotta get going.
translation.es: Eso suena divino, pero no puedo. Debo irme.

translation.en: No, Maddie. If you don't start taking care of yourself,
translation.es: No, Maddie. Si no empiezas a cuidarte,

translation.en: who's gonna take care of your children?
Your friends?
And all the people counting on you?
translation.es: y a los que cuentan contigo?

translation.en: Mama, you sound like Helen and Dana Sue.
translation.es: Mamá, suenas como Helen y Dana Sue.

translation.en: What're you going on about?
Oh, they... [chuckles]
They have this crazy idea about opening a spa
translation.es: ...tienen la idea delirante de abrir un spa

translation.en: and having me run it, and I just...
translation.es: y que yo lo maneje, y yo…

translation.en: They keep telling me how wonderful it'll be, but honestly, it...
translation.es: Me dicen que sería maravilloso, pero la verdad…

translation.en: it sounds overwhelming. And terrifying.
I thought you were done with other people planning your life for you.
translation.es: Creí que ya no dejarías que otros te digan qué hacer con tu vida.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
Now, if you want to do it, do it.
translation.es: Pues bien, si quieres hacerlo, hazlo.

translation.en: Now if you think it's a crazy idea, tell them.
translation.es: Si crees que es un delirio, debes decirles.

translation.en: Those girls love you. They'll respect your decision.
translation.es: Esas chicas te adoran. Respetarán tu decisión.

translation.en: You chart... your own path.
-All right? -Okay.
-Okay. -[laughs]
I love you so much. I love you too.
I am so happy that Maddie came around.
translation.es: Me alegra que Maddie cambiara de opinión.

translation.en: I hate to break it to you, but she's gonna say no.
translation.es: Odio darte malas noticias, pero dirá que no.

translation.en: She's overwhelmed, and I can't say that I blame her.
translation.es: Se siente abrumada y la entiendo perfectamente.

translation.en: So why would she wanna meet us here?
This is where the dream started. What better place to say farewell?
translation.es: Es donde comenzó el sueño. El mejor lugar para despedirse.
